class.name: Quat
class.description: A unit quaternion used for representing 3D rotations. It is similar to [Basis], which implements matrix representation of rotations, and can be parametrized using both an axis-angle pair or Euler angles. But due to its compactness and the way it is stored in memory, certain operations (obtaining axis-angle and performing SLERP, in particular) are more efficient and robust against floating-point errors. Quaternions need to be (re)normalized.

method.name: Quat
method.description: Returns the rotation matrix corresponding to the given quaternion.

method.name: Quat
method.description: Returns a quaternion that will perform a rotation specified by Euler angles (in the YXZ convention: first Z, then X, and Y last), given in the vector format as (X angle, Y angle, Z angle).

method.name: Quat
method.description: Returns a quaternion that will rotate around the given axis by the specified angle. The axis must be a normalized vector.

method.name: Quat
method.description: Returns a quaternion defined by these values.

method.name: cubic_slerp
method.description: Performs a cubic spherical-linear interpolation with another quaternion.

method.name: dot
method.description: Returns the dot product of two quaternions.

method.name: get_euler
method.description: Returns Euler angles (in the YXZ convention: first Z, then X, and Y last) corresponding to the rotation represented by the unit quaternion. Returned vector contains the rotation angles in the format (X angle, Y angle, Z angle).

method.name: inverse
method.description: Returns the inverse of the quaternion.

method.name: is_equal_approx
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this quaterion and [code]quat[/code] are approximately equal, by running [method @GDScript.is_equal_approx] on each component.

method.name: is_normalized
method.description: Returns whether the quaternion is normalized or not.

method.name: length
method.description: Returns the length of the quaternion.

method.name: length_squared
method.description: Returns the length of the quaternion, squared.

method.name: normalized
method.description: Returns a copy of the quaternion, normalized to unit length.

method.name: set_axis_angle
method.description: Sets the quaternion to a rotation which rotates around axis by the specified angle, in radians. The axis must be a normalized vector.

method.name: set_euler
method.description: Sets the quaternion to a rotation specified by Euler angles (in the YXZ convention: first Z, then X, and Y last), given in the vector format as (X angle, Y angle, Z angle).

method.name: slerp
method.description: Performs a spherical-linear interpolation with another quaternion.

method.name: slerpni
method.description: Performs a spherical-linear interpolation with another quaterion without checking if the rotation path is not bigger than 90Â°.

method.name: xform
method.description: Transforms the vector [code]v[/code] by this quaternion.

constants.constant: The identity rotation. Equivalent to an identity matrix. If a vector is transformed by an identity quaternion, it will not change.
